oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Osalausestaja
Clause Segmenter for Estonian
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Orasmaa, Siim
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Clause Segmenter is a program that splits long and complex natural language sentences into smaller segments (clauses). For example, the sentence "Mees, keda seal kohtasime, oli tuttav ja teretas meid." will be split into following clauses:
"[Mees, [keda seal kohtasime,] oli tuttav ja] [teretas meid.]" (in the example, clauses are surrounded by brackets)
The algorithm mainly relies on punctuation, conjunction words, and finite verb forms on identifying the clause boundaries. For linguistic details/motivations behind the algorithm, see (Kaalep, Muischnek 2012).
